price: ߖߘߍ߬ߘߐ߬ߓߊ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊߣߍ߲߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊ߲ߠߎ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߠߴߏ߬ ߘߐ߫
arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوٓاْ إِنَّا بِٱلَّذِيٓ ءَامَنتُم بِهِۦ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qāla alladhīna is'takbarū innā bi-alladhī āmantum bihi kāfirūna
